mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, in_code, order_no, stock_id, supplier_id, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, remark, audit_code, audit_id, audit_name, audit_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, (select b.name from base_supplier b where b.id = supplier_id and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode}) as name from stro_in where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select count(0) from stro_in where (audit_code = '1' or audit_code = '2') and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id in
#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into stro_in(id,hosp_code, in_code, order_no, stock_id, supplier_id, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, remark, audit_code, audit_id, audit_name, audit_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,in_order_no) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, #{inCode}, #{orderNo}, #{stockId}, #{supplierId}, #{buyPriceAll}, #{sellPriceAll}, #{remark}, '0', #{auditId}, #{auditName}, #{auditTime}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime},#{inOrderNo})
mapper.update:
update stro_in
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
in_code = #{inCode},
order_no = #{orderNo},
stock_id = #{stockId},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
buy_price_all = #{buyPriceAll},
sell_price_all = #{sellPriceAll},
remark = #{remark},
audit_code = #{auditCode},
audit_id = #{auditId},
audit_name = #{auditName},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and stock_id = #{stockId}
mapper.delete: delete from stro_in where id = #{id} where hosp_code = #{hospCode}

update.foreach:
update stro_in_detail
hosp_code = #{item.hospCode},
in_id = #{item.inId},
item_code = #{item.itemCode},
item_id = #{item.itemId},
item_name = #{item.itemName},
spec = #{item.spec},
num = #{item.num},
ndan = #{item.ndan},
unit_code = #{item.unitCode},
dosage = #{item.dosage},
dosage_unit_code = #{item.dosageUnitCode},
buy_price = #{item.buyPrice},
sell_price = #{item.sellPrice},
buy_price_all = #{item.buyPriceAll},
sell_price_all = #{item.sellPriceAll},
split_ratio = #{item.splitRatio},
split_num = #{item.splitNum},
split_price = #{item.splitPrice},
split_unit_code = #{item.splitUnitCode},
batch_no = #{item.batchNo},
expiry_date = #{item.expiryDate},
prod_code = #{item.prodCode},
where id = #{item.id} and hosp_code = #{item.hospCode}

mapper.insert:
insert into stro_in_detail(id,hosp_code, in_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, num, unit_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, buy_price, sell_price, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, split_ratio, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code, batch_no, expiry_date,ndan,prod_code) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.inId}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.spec}, #{item.num}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.dosage}, #{item.dosageUnitCode}, #{item.buyPrice}, #{item.sellPrice}, #{item.buyPriceAll}, #{item.sellPriceAll}, #{item.splitRatio}, #{item.splitNum}, #{item.splitPrice}, #{item.splitUnitCode}, #{item.batchNo}, #{item.expiryDate},#{item.ndan},#{item.prodCode})

insert into stro_in(id,hosp_code, in_code, order_no, stock_id, supplier_id, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, remark, audit_code, audit_id, audit_name, audit_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, '22', #{orderNo}, #{inStockId}, #{outStockId}, #{buyPriceAll}, #{sellPriceAll}, #{remark}, '0', null, null, null , #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})

insert into stro_in_detail(id,hosp_code, in_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, num, unit_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, buy_price, sell_price, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, split_ratio, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code, batch_no, expiry_date,prod_code) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.inId}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.spec}, #{item.num}, #{item.unitCode}, #{item.dosage}, #{item.dosageUnitCode}, #{item.buyPrice}, #{item.sellPrice}, #{item.buyPriceAll}, #{item.sellPriceAll}, #{item.splitRatio}, #{item.splitNum}, #{item.splitPrice}, #{item.splitUnitCode}, #{item.batchNo}, #{item.expiryDate},#{item.prodCode})
mapper.select: select item_id,max(item_code) as itemCode,round(sum(buy_price * num)/sum(num),4) as avgBuyPrice from stro_in_record where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and item_code =#{itemCode} and item_id = #{itemId} group by item_id
mapper.update: update stro_in set fkr_id = #{fkrId}, fkr_name = #{fkrName}, fk_status_code = #{fkStatusCode}, fk_remark = #{fkRemark}, fkdid = #{fkdid}, fk_time = #{fkTime} where id = #{id}
